item.title: 能源价格下跌，欧洲铝产量开始复苏
item.description: Trimet Aluminium SE 将在未来一年内将其位于法国和德国的冶炼厂的产量提高到满负荷，这表明能源价格的下降正在帮助欧洲铝业从生存危机的边缘恢复过来。【原文：Trimet Aluminium SE will ramp up production at its smelters in France and Germany to full capacity in the coming year, in a sign that falling energy prices are helping to bring the European aluminum industry back from the brink of an existential crisis.】

item.title: 财政部长表示，津巴布韦将把 ZiG 货币打击范围扩大到公司
item.description: 津巴布韦计划将针对街头货币交易商的打击范围扩大到公司，以确保商品和服务的定价只使用新 ZiG 货币的官方汇率。【原文：Zimbabwe plans to extend a crackdown that’s targeting street currency traders to companies to ensure goods and services are priced using only the official exchange rate of the new ZiG currency.】

item.title: 比尔-黄与纽约市权力经纪人建立联系，与市长埃里克-亚当斯关系密切
item.description: 比尔-黄（Bill Hwang）在努力远离监狱的过程中遇到了一个不太可能的盟友。【原文：Bill Hwang has an unlikely ally as he tries to stay out of prison.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称 6 月降息概率 "显著
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行很有可能在 6 月 6 日的会议上开始降息。【原文：Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said it’s very probable that the European Central Bank will start cutting interest rates at its June 6 meeting.】

item.title: 铝订单激增后，LME仓库排队情况有所恢复
item.description: 两起从伦敦金属交易所（London Metal Exchange）库存中提取铝的巨额请求，使该交易所面临着一个老对手的卷土重来：仓库排队。【原文：Two huge requests to withdraw aluminum from London Metal Exchange stockpiles have confronted the exchange with the return of an old enemy: the warehouse queue.】

item.title: DLF 准备进军孟买和果阿的豪宅市场
item.description: 印度最大房地产开发商 DLF Ltd. 的一位高级官员表示，该公司正在孟买试水豪华公寓市场，先在该市开发一个项目，然后再在金融中心推出更多项目。【原文：DLF Ltd. is testing Mumbai’s luxury market for condominiums with a project in the city before launching more in the financial hub, a senior official at India’s biggest real estate developer said.】

item.title: 欧盟监测菲戈枪击案的 "虚假信息传播
item.description: 欧盟委员会表示，它正在 "积极监控 "有关周三斯洛伐克总理罗伯特-菲佐遭枪击的假新闻的传播，并警告说，如果大科技平台未能解决虚假信息问题，它可能会对其处以罚款。【原文：The European Commission said it’s “actively monitoring” the spread of fake news about Wednesday’s shooting Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico and warned it can slap Big Tech platforms with fines for failing to tackle disinformation.】

item.title: 贵宾通道 "大流行病口罩供应商卷入伦敦审判
item.description: 一家在大流行病期间赢得了价值超过 10 亿英镑（13 亿美元）英国政府合同的物流公司卷入了一场审判，争论的焦点是：在第一波 Covid-19 医疗设备采购竞赛中，该公司中断与一家供应商的合同是否合理。【原文：A logistics firm which won over £1 billion ($1.3 billion) worth of UK government contracts during the pandemic is embroiled in a trial over whether it was justified in breaking off a contract with a supplier during the race to source medical equipment during the first wave of Covid-19.】

item.title: 人工智能乐观情绪升温，苹果股价重回胜利轨道
item.description: 经过几个月的挣扎，苹果公司看起来更像过去的股市领头羊了。【原文：After months of struggles, Apple Inc. is looking a lot more like the stock market leader it used to be.】

item.title: 巴宝莉最大的 "熊 "认为奢侈品股票将跌至 2010 年水平
item.description: 英国奢侈品公司巴宝莉集团（Burberry Group Plc）周三公布的财报乏善可陈，该公司最大的 "熊市 "投资者对该股的看法变得更加负面。【原文：Burberry Group Plc’s biggest bear just became even more negative on the stock following Wednesday’s lackluster results from the British luxury firm.】

item.title: 英国皇家邮政业主就克里廷斯基竞购案接受商务大臣质询
item.description: 英国皇家邮政母公司负责人周四将与英国商务大臣凯米-巴德诺克（Kemi Badenoch）会面，此前该公司欢迎亿万富翁股东丹尼尔-克里廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）提出的 35 亿英镑（44 亿美元）收购要约。【原文：The head of Royal Mail’s parent company is meeting UK Business Secretary Kemi Badenoch Thursday after it welcomed a £3.5 billion ($4.4 billion) takeover bid from billionaire shareholder Daniel Kretinsky.】

item.title: 天然气需求的大赌注显示燃料远未消退
item.description:
能源富国卡塔尔正在向液化天然气项目投入数十亿美元，因为买家锁定了数十年的供应。【原文：

Energy-rich Qatar is plowing billions of dollars into LNG projects as buyers lock in supplies for decades.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行纳格尔质疑新框架提供的激励措施
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，新操作框架中较小的利差可能会对贷款人产生不良激励。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said the narrower interest-rate spread in the new operational framework might provide undesirable incentives for lenders.】

item.title: 加拿大鹅在华业绩超预期，股价大涨
item.description: 高端大衣制造商加拿大鹅控股公司（Canada Goose Holdings Inc.在纽约早盘交易中，该公司股价大涨超过 12%。【原文：High-end coat maker Canada Goose Holdings Inc. reported higher-than-expected sales growth on strong retail results in China and the US. The shares jumped more than 12% in early trading in New York.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯认为工资增长放缓，但对加息路径持谨慎态度
item.description: 欧洲央行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，欧元区薪资增长正在放缓，但由于不确定性增加，欧洲央行无法承诺降息路径。【原文：Increases in euro-area salaries are moderating but the European Central Bank can’t commit to a path for interest-rate cuts due to elevated uncertainty, Vice President Luis de Guindos said.】

item.title: 美联储主席威廉姆斯认为目前没有理由改变政策立场
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯表示，最新的美国通胀数据证实物价压力正在逐步缓解，但他仍需要更多证据来调整利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said the latest US inflation data confirm price pressures are gradually easing but he still needs more evidence to adjust interest rates.】

item.title: GameStop 和 AMC 延续低迷，因备忘录推动的反弹解体
item.description: GameStop Corp.和 AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc.连续第二日下跌，本周笼罩市场的 "备忘录股 "热潮进一步消退。【原文：GameStop Corp. and AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. headed for a second day of declines, as the meme-stock frenzy that gripped markets this week fades further.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。尽管通胀有所降温，但美联储官员们仍在按部就班地工作，meme 股票在疯狂摇摆，老派债券经理们正在重新调整他们的策略。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Fed officials are sticking to the script despite cooler inflation, meme stocks are swinging wildly and old-school bond managers are retooling their strategies. item.title: Rokos 对冲基金高管排除了 2024 年美联储降息的可能性
item.description: 克里斯-罗科斯（Chris Rokos）对冲基金的高管理查德-唐（Richard Tang）说，美联储今年不太可能放松货币政策。【原文：Richard Tang, an executive at Chris Rokos’s hedge fund, says it’s unlikely the Federal Reserve will loosen monetary policy this year.】

item.title: 贝宁在中国干预后解除对尼日尔石油运输的封锁
item.description: 在中国石油天然气集团公司官员介入贝宁与邻国尼日尔之间的争端后，贝宁政府同意解除对尼日尔石油出口的封锁。【原文：Benin’s government agreed to unblock oil exports from neighboring Niger after officials from China National Petroleum Corp. intervened in a dispute between the two countries.】

item.title: 新月能源公司即将以 21 亿美元收购银弓公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新月能源公司（Crescent Energy Inc.【原文：Crescent Energy Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire SilverBow Resources Inc., a rival oil and gas producer that is in a proxy fight with its largest shareholder, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本生命以 38 亿美元从 AIG 收购 Corebridge 20% 的股份
item.description: 日本生命保险公司表示，已同意以约 38 亿美元现金收购 Corebridge Financial Inc.【原文：Nippon Life Insurance Co. said it has agreed to acquire a 20% stake in Corebridge Financial Inc. for about $3.8 billion in cash, marking its biggest-ever deal as it seeks a foothold in the US.】

item.title: 投资者对日本央行周五是否会再次削减债券购买量看法不一
item.description: 对于日本央行本周五在常规购买行动中减少政府债券购买量的做法是否会重蹈本周早些时候的覆辙，投资者意见不一。【原文：Investors are divided on the likelihood of the Bank of Japan repeating its surprise move earlier this week by reducing purchases of government bonds in a regular buying operation on Friday.】

item.title: 中国首次特别债券发行可能迎来强劲需求
item.description: 根据策略师和对债券市场情绪的判断，中国将于本周五首次发行的今年特别主权债券预计将迎来稳健的需求。【原文：China’s first issuance of this year’s special sovereign bonds on Friday is expected to see solid demand, according to strategists and gauges of sentiment in the bond market.】

item.title: 英国未能为伦敦学生提供足够的经济适用房
item.description: 据一份报告称，英国残缺不全的规划系统阻碍了伦敦经济型学生宿舍的发展，并对该市本已紧张的租房市场造成压力。【原文：The UK’s broken planning system is holding back the development of affordable student accommodation in London and exerting pressure on the city’s already squeezed rental market, according to a report.】

item.title: 尼日利亚新建大型炼油厂寻求数百万桶美国石油
item.description: 尼日利亚拉各斯附近新建的大型炼油厂正在寻求在明年购买数百万桶美国原油，以提高加工率。【原文：Nigeria’s new mega refinery near Lagos is seeking to buy millions of barrels of US crude over the next year as it ramps up processing rates.】

item.title: 诺和诺德扩大产量，丹麦上调经济增长预期
item.description: 丹麦政府目前预测今年的经济增长率将达到 2.7%，几乎是之前预计的两倍，这主要得益于斯堪的纳维亚国家诺和诺德制药公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的蓬勃发展。【原文：Denmark’s government now predicts the economy will expand 2.7% this year, almost double the rate it previously estimated, accelerated by the Scandinavian country’s flourishing pharmaceutical company Novo Nordisk A/S.】

item.title: 印度季风适时来临，关注降雨以缓解抑制因素
item.description: 印度预计今年季风开始的时间将略微提前，预计降雨量将高于平均水平，从而有望获得更大的收成，并放宽对一些农作物的出口限制。【原文：India expects the monsoon to start slightly earlier this year, with a forecast for above-average rain raising the prospect for bigger harvests and the easing of export curbs on some crops.】

item.title: 中国周五将与银行和监管机构讨论房地产援助问题
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国政府计划于周五上午召开主要官员会议，讨论房地产市场问题，包括清理过剩住房库存的建议。【原文：China’s government plans to hold a meeting with key officials on Friday morning to discuss the property market, including a proposal to clear excess housing inventory, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
